game.name: Super Kid Perfect Jump
game.description:
This super kid is excited for making jump from one place to another. However, the problem is today he is bit tired to get the job done on his own. Would you like to guide him to make some winning jumps again? Join Super Kid Perfect Jump and be prepared to control him when he wants to make jump from one platform to another one! Try to make him jump rightly on the center of the next platform to score higher points in this brand new adventure game!
Your victory will depend upon how wisely you time your jump. You will fail and lose your life if you time your jump wrongly. The longer you go, the higher score you will be able to make in the end. You will die in any case either if your character crosses the platform in the air or he finds it difficulty in reaching the platform. When you click the play button, the cute super kid along with the two platforms will be shown on the screen. 
Click or tap the screen to get him ready to jump through a hanging stick! This stick will keep moving from left to right and vice-versa. Click or tap the screen when he reaches near to the platform where you want to make him jump in this HTML5 jumping game! You can play this cool jumper challenge on mobile phones, PCs, tablets and iPhones or iPads without download. Our free online game website features many such top jumping games that can help keep you busy for long. Good luck!
